TopicTitle: Kerbal stuck on Loading Expansions (no mods)

Articles.Content: My game is stuck at Loading Expansions. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the game. I have been through properties on steam to look for invalid files. I have deleted all kerbal files off my pc (bye bye save files). I have never used any mods.

You're in the wrong place if you don't use mods, this is the modded installs section.

Start up KSP, then wait for it to reach the point where it stops loading and look for the following files, if you're on Windows:

C:/Users/your_username_here/appdata/locallow/squad/kerbal space program/Player.txt

C:/Users/your_username_here/appdata/locallow/squad/kerbal space program/output_log.txt, if it's dated from the time you started KSP.

And KSP.txt from inside the KSP directory.

Open those files, start at the bottom and search up for 'ERR', 'EXC', 'error', 'crash' or 'exception'. If you find any of those, upload the files to the file sharing website of your choice and post links to them here so someone can have a look at them.

It's also useful (and by useful I mean necessary!) to say what version of KSP you're using, and in this case the specs of the PC/laptop you're using (which should be right at the top of KSP.txt in the KSP folder- operating system, CPU, GPU and RAM).
